structure.name: Reference
structure.description: A reference to one or more entries in a file

structure.name: SmallReference
structure.description: A reference to one or more entries in a file

structure.name: Vector3As3Fixed8
structure.description: A vector out of 3 bytes which must be converted with the formula (((i / 255.0) * 2) -1) to get the actual float value

structure.name: Vector2As2fixed16
structure.description: A vector out of int16 values which must be converted with the formula (i / 2048.0) to get the actual float value

structure.name: COL
structure.description: Defines a color with alpha using 1 byte for each color component

structure.name: FLAG
structure.description: Used by animations, propably to store multiple flags as it js not just 0 and 1

structure.name: BNDS
structure.description: Describes the rough shape of an object. Center of bounding sphere = (extend0 + extend1)/2

structure.name: AnimationReferenceHeader
structure.description:
The header of a reference to an animation entry
interpolation: 0=constant, 1=linear flags seems to be 6 if the animation reference is valid and 0 otherwise id seem to be random but unique numbers

structure.name: Unknown4ByteAnimationReference
structure.description: Animatable of unknown type with 4 bytes (e.g. could be a float or color animation reference)

structure.name: CHAR
structure.description: An one byte character. An array always terminates with 0.

structure.name: MD34IndexEntry
structure.description: Entry of the tag index. Position and size of the tag index gets desribed by MD34

structure.name: VertexFormat
structure.description: Vertex structure, size and fields depends on vflags in MODL tag

field.name: tan_sign
field.hint: Can be -1.0 in old 3ds max exporter files

structure.name: SDEV
structure.description: Event Key Frames Animation block with reference to EVNT

structure.name: SD2V
structure.description: Vector 2 Animation block with reference to VEC2

structure.name: SD3V
structure.description: Vector 3 Animation block with reference to VEC3

structure.name: SDR3
structure.description: Animation block with reference to REAL(float array)

structure.name: SDCC
structure.description: Animation block with reference to COL (Color)

structure.name: SD08
structure.description: Animation block with reference to I32_

structure.name: SDS6
structure.description: Animation block with reference to I16_

structure.name: SDS3
structure.description: Animation block with reference to I32_

structure.name: SDU6
structure.description: Animation block with reference to U16_

structure.name: SD4Q
structure.description: Animation block with reference to QUAT

structure.name: SDFG
structure.description: Animation block with reference to FLAG

structure.name: SDMB
structure.description: Animation block with reference to BNDS

structure.name: STC_
structure.description:
Sequence Transformations Collection of a Sub Animation animId: array of animation ids animref: array of integers is actually an array of short pairs: first 2 bytes: index which determines the field in this struct and thus kind of the animation data. e.g. 0 -> sdev, 1 -> sd2v etc. second: index in animation reference. e.g. sdev[index]
There also seems to be always be the animation id: 0x65bd3215 which referes to sdev[0] which has a name called "Evt_SeqEnd" Strangly it gets from no where referenced and is always the same id

structure.name: STG_
structure.description: Seqeuence Transformation Group which can contain multiple STCs referenced by index as they are listed in the model.

structure.name: LITE
structure.description: Light types: 0=directional 1=point 2=spot, hotSpot expressed in radians

structure.name: MATM
structure.description: A reference to a material of a specified type

field.name: partIndex
field.hint: List of indices for the PATU list defined in the model

structure.name: LAYR
structure.description: Describes a layer of a material

field.name: flags
field.hint: isVideo: if texture is ogg video

field.name: colorChannelSetting
field.hint: Allowed colorChannelSetting values: 0: RGB 1: RGBA (used for alpha) 2: Alpha Only 3: Red Only 4: Green Only 5: Blue Only

field.name: noiseUnknown
field.hint: needs to be 2 for volume noise materials

field.name: rttChannel
field.hint: Render To Texture Channel "-1", "None", "None" "0", "Layer 1", "Render To Texture Layer 1" "1", "Layer 2", "Render To Texture Layer 2" "2", "Layer 3", "Render To Texture Layer 3" "3", "Layer 4", "Render To Texture Layer 4" "4", "Layer 5", "Render To Texture Layer 5" "5", "Layer 6", "Render To Texture Layer 6" "6", "Layer 7", "Render To Texture Layer 7"

field.name: videoFrameRate
field.hint: if video is enabled default should be 24

field.name: videoEndFrame
field.hint: -1 means till the end

field.name: videoMode
field.hint: 0 is loop, 1 is hold

field.name: videoPlay
field.hint: SDU3 is used for aniamtion

field.name: videoRestart
field.hint: SDFG is used for aniamtion

field.name: fresnelType
field.hint: 0: disabled, 1:enabled, 2:enabled (inverted)

field.name: fresnelMaxOffset
field.hint: fresnelMin + fresnelMaxOffset = fresnelMax

field.name: fresnel_reflection
field.hint: unsure if this is the technically correct name, but this is my first guess based my observations

field.name: additionalFlags
field.hint: useDepthBlendFalloff: always set if depthBlendFalloff is != 0.0 makesUseOfVertexColor: calculated value: based on the flag useVertexColor. It is always set if the material is used by a particle system. makesUseOfVertexAlpha: Calculated value: based on the flag useVertexColor and the particle flag makesUseOfVertexAlpha

field.name: flags
field.hint: if useVertexColor is set, the following flags need also to be set: * makesUseOfVertexColor of the additionaFlags field * hasVertexColors of the vFlags field of the model if useVertexAlpha is set, the following flags need also to be set: * makesUseOfVertexAlpha of the additionaFlags field * hasVertexColors of the vFlags field of the model geometryVisible was added between version 15 and 18 propably. => Should be 0 in 15

field.name: blendMode
field.hint: 0 "Opaque" 1 'Alpha Blend' 2 'Add' 3 'Alpha Add' 4 'Mod' 5 'Mod 2x'

field.name: usedRTTChannels
field.hint: RTT=render to texture

field.name: depthBlendFalloff
field.hint: Only used if the bit useDepthBlendFalloff of additionalFlags is set, typically set for particle systems

field.name: layerBlendType
field.hint: 0 "Mod" 1 'Mod 2x' 2 'Add' 3 'Blend' 4 'Team Color Emissive Add' 5 'Team Color Diffuse Add'

field.name: emisBlendType
field.hint: 0 "Mod" 1 'Mod 2x' 2 'Add' 3 'Blend' 4 'Team Color Emissive Add' 5 'Team Color Diffuse Add'

field.name: specType
field.hint: 0: RGB, 1:Alpha Only

structure.name: PAR_
structure.description: Particle System smoothingTypes: 0: Linear 1: Smooth 2: Bezier 3: Linear Hold 4: Bezier Hold

field.name: particleType
field.hint: particleType: 0,2,3,4,5=Square Billbords ? 1= Speed Scaled and Rotated Billbords influenced by lengthWidhtRatio 6 = Rectangular Billbords (see lengthWidthRatio) 7 = Quads with speed as normal 9 = Quads that scratches between spawn point and current location

structure.name: FOR_
structure.description: Force that effects particles of certain particle systems

field.name: shape
field.hint: Shape types: 0 = box 1 = sphere 2 = capsule 3 = cylinder 4 = convex hull 5 = mesh 6+ = invalid

structure.name: SSGS
structure.description:
Describes a super simple geometic shape
0 = Cuboid (width=size0, length=size1, height=size2) 1 = Sphere (radius=size0) 2 = Cylinder? (radius=size0, height=size1))

structure.name: ATVL
structure.description:
Attachment Volume
The type attribute specifies the meaning of the size values:
0 = Cuboid (width=size0, length=size1, height=size2) 1 = Sphere (radius=size0) 2 = Cylinder (radius=size0, height=size1))

structure.name: SRIB
structure.description: Spline Ribbon: An additional end point of this ribbon.

structure.name: RIB_
structure.description: Ribbon effect. 0 - PlanarBillboarded 1 - Planar 2 - Cylinder 3 - Star Shaped

field.name: centerBias
field.hint: middle point position

field.name: radiusScale
field.hint: X=Start, Y=Middle, Z=END

field.name: noEndPoints
field.hint: noEndPoints must be 0 if there are endPoints (SRIB)

structure.name: MODL
structure.description: Describes the content of the file. bone must have same size like IREF

field.name: vFlags
field.hint: UV flags aren't always set in order, for instance 0x41820261 has two UVs - does it affect the model in some way? - examples: SpaceDockEngineSmall.m3 Void_Thrasher_Walker.m3

field.name: cameras_addon
field.hint: count seems to match camera count

structure.name: MD34
structure.description: Header of a M3 file: Can be found at the start of the file.

structure.name: MD33
structure.description: Header of a M3 file from SC2 Beta
